formalpara.title: Interner Hilfetext zu diesem AMI-Befehl in Asterisk 1.4:

para.screen: Action: Hangup Synopsis: Hangup Channel Privilege: call,all Description: Hangup a channel Variables: Channel: The channel name to be hungup

formalpara.title: Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.2 zu 1.4:
Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.4 zu 1.6:

para.screen: --- in Asterisk 1.4 +++ in Asterisk 1.6 @@ -1,6 +1,6 @@ Action: Hangup Synopsis: Hangup Channel - Privilege: call,all + Privilege: system,call,all Description: Hangup a channel Variables: Channel: The channel name to be hungup
